keywords.value: Assn for a Better New York
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The mayor, who railed against big business during his campaign, is making what corporate executives described as a delayed attempt to meet them on their home turf.

headline.print_headline: De Blasio Tries Wooing, Not Riling, Business Leaders
headline.main: New Tack for de Blasio: Wooing Business Leaders He Once Denounced

snippet: The mayor, who railed against big business during his campaign, is making what corporate executives described as a delayed attempt to meet them on their home turf.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio is making first sustained effort of his term to court business leaders after campaign spent criticizing big business; private phone calls with business figures, visits to corporations and hosted events reflect de Blasio's recognition of value of corporate allies.
